technical.question: How easy is it to integrate the search system?
technical.answer: Integration is straightforward with our JavaScript widget or API. Most websites can be set up within minutes using our step-by-step guide.

technical.question: What programming languages are supported?
technical.answer: Our API supports all major programming languages including JavaScript, Python, PHP, Ruby, and Java.

technical.question: How secure is the data?
technical.answer: We use enterprise-grade encryption and follow industry best practices for data security. All data is encrypted both in transit and at rest.

business.question: Can I upgrade or downgrade my plan?
business.answer: Yes, you can change your plan at any time. Changes take effect at the start of the next billing cycle.

business.question: Do you offer a free trial?
business.answer: Yes, we offer a 14-day free trial on all plans with full feature access.

business.question: What kind of support do you provide?
business.answer: We offer email support for all plans, priority support for Professional plans, and 24/7 dedicated support for Enterprise customers.
